localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Vinyls is a beautiful music player built with iOS design guidelines in mind. There are no complicated user accounts or settings to configure. You can start listening to your music right away. You can scrub to seek, watch the tone arm follow the playback time.
blogPost.body: Vinyls is a beautiful music player built with iOS design guidelines in mind. There are no complicated user accounts or settings to configure. You can start listening to your music right away. You can scrub to seek, watch the tone arm follow the playback time.
blogPost.title: Vinyls - A beautiful music player for iOS
blogPost.author: JPEGuin

localize.description: Vinyls是一款以iOS设计准则打造的精美音乐播放器。没有复杂的用户账户或设置配置。你可以马上开始听你的音乐。你可以擦拭寻找，看音臂跟随播放时间。
localize.tagline: iOS上的一款精美的音乐播放器

localize.description: Vinyls是一款以iOS設計準則打造的精美音樂播放器。沒有複雜的用戶賬戶或設置配置。你可以馬上開始聽你的音樂。你可以擦拭尋找，看音臂跟隨播放時間。
localize.tagline: iOS上的一款精美的音樂播放器

previous.excerpt: Splitsub is a group buying app for online consumer subscriptions in India. Users share more than 25 different types of subscriptions ranging from streaming services to productivity softwares
previous.title: Splitsub - Group buying app for online subscriptions

localize.description: Splitsub是印度一款在线消费订阅的团购应用。用户分享超过25种不同类型的订阅，从流媒体服务到生产力软件。
Splitsub是印度一款在線消費訂閱的團購應用。用戶分享超過25種不同類型的訂閱，從流媒體服務到生產力軟件。

next.excerpt: Mobilo Wood Card resembles the ecological aspirations of our brand. With this brand new, one-of-its-kind, NFC-powered, smart business card, we want to provide an opportunity for companies to truly distance themselves from paper waste.
next.title: Mobilo Wood - Smart business card made of wood

localize.description: 美宝乐木卡与我们品牌的生态诉求相仿。我们希望通过这种全新的、独一无二的、由NFC驱动的智能名片，为企业提供一个真正远离纸张浪费的机会。
美寶樂木卡與我們品牌的生態訴求相仿。我們希望通過這種全新的、獨一無二的、由NFC驅動的智能名片，爲企業提供一個真正遠離紙張浪費的機會。
